DataElement.preferredName: Vital Status Reference Point Day From Anchor Date Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of days between the date used for index and the reference date for determination of vital status.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Vital Status Reference Point Day From Anchor Date
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The state or condition of being living or deceased; also includes the case where the vital status is unknown._A specified location to which measurements are referred._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument._The base date from which all other dates within a cohort or data set are derived.
